name: Italian Casserole
instructions: Cook beef, onion and peppers in skillet until the meat is no longer pink and veggies are tender.
Add other ingredients except noodles and cheese.
While meat is simmering cook noodles.
Place noodles in the bottom of one large casserole dish or 2 medium sized casserole dishes.
Cover casserole and bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
You can freeze one or half the recipe.
